translation.zh: 你是因为什么进来的？

translation.en: I sucker punched a cop.
translation.zh: 我偷袭了一个警察

translation.en: [John Doe] That's not what you're in for.
translation.zh: 你不是因为这个才进来的

translation.en: You're in for a lot more than that.
translation.zh: 你来这里的原因要比那复杂得多

translation.en: What'd you do?
translation.zh: 你做了什么？

translation.en: Did what I had to do
translation.zh: 我只是做了必须要做的事

translation.en: to get in here.
translation.zh: 为了进来这里

translation.en: To get to you, Teddy.
translation.zh: 为了找到你 泰迪

translation.en: It's important you listen carefully.
translation.zh: 你一定要仔细听好

translation.en: -Don't have much time. -Hey.
translation.zh: -没有太多时间了-喂

translation.en: -Hey! Somebody! -[John Doe] Hey, Teddy!
translation.zh: -喂 来人啊！-嘿 泰迪！

translation.en: Answer me, 914 Glenview Crescent, apartment number 16.
translation.zh: 回答我 盖伦纽半月街914号16号公寓

translation.en: Who lives there?
translation.zh: 谁住在那里？

translation.en: A woman and a boy.
translation.zh: 一个女人和一个男孩

translation.en: What in the fuck are you guys going on about?
translation.zh: 你们到底他妈的在搞什么？

translation.en: -Shut the fuck up! -I just want my food, man. I want my food.
translation.zh: -他妈的闭嘴-我只想要些食物 我想要食物

translation.en: Shouldn't eat loaf after midnight.
translation.zh: 午夜后不能吃监禁面包

translation.en: That shit'll give you nightmares. The big black kind.
translation.zh: 那玩意儿会让你做噩梦的那种又大又黑的噩梦

translation.en: [John Doe] Get me a hot dog, please?
translation.zh: 能给我来个热狗吗？

translation.en: Shut the fuck up!
translation.zh: 他妈的闭嘴！

translation.en: You guys keep fucking with me, I'mma bring the hose in on both y'all bitch-asses.
translation.zh: 你们再他妈的搞我我就拿水管来浇你们两个混蛋

translation.en: [John Doe] Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: What do they want?
translation.zh: 他们想要什么？

translation.en: You know what they want.
translation.zh: 你知道他们想要什么

translation.en: Can we make a deal?
translation.zh: 我们能做个交易吗？

translation.en: [John Doe] Listen, Teddy.
translation.zh: 听着 泰迪

translation.en: I don't want you to think that you can save yourself,
translation.zh: 你不要认为你能救自己

translation.en: because you obviously can't.
translation.zh: 因为你显然不能

translation.en: But there are other considerations.
translation.zh: 但还有其他的考虑因素

translation.en: Like my ex? Is that what you're talking about?
translation.zh: 比如我的前妻？你是在说这个吗？

translation.en: [scoffs] Like I give a shit?
translation.zh: 你以为我在乎吗？

translation.en: The kid ain't even mine, man.
translation.zh: 那孩子甚至不是我亲生的

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: What guarantees you give me you'll spare 'em? Hm?
translation.zh: 你怎么能向我保证你会放过他们？

translation.en: Guarantees aren't mine to give, Teddy.
translation.zh: 该做保证的人不是我 泰迪

translation.en: You know how this goes, all right?
translation.zh: 你知道事情会怎样发展 对吧？

translation.en: It's up to you where I go next.
translation.zh: 我接下来该怎么做 由你决定

translation.en: You can't do shit to me in here, pal.
translation.zh: 你在这里对我做不了什么 伙计

translation.en: You know what? Actually, you can't do a fucking thing.
translation.zh: 你猜怎么着？你他妈的什么都做不了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: What "okay"? What's that?
translation.zh: 什么“好吧”？什么意思？

translation.en: What "okay"?
translation.zh: 什么“好吧”？

translation.en: [John Doe] It is what it is, Teddy.
translation.zh: 那就这样吧 泰迪

translation.en: What do you mean, "It is what it is"?
translation.zh: “那就这样吧”是什么意思？

translation.en: My ex and my kid.
translation.zh: 我的前妻和我的孩子

translation.en: They alive?
translation.zh: 他们还活着？

translation.en: [Mitchell] Officer Hue.
translation.zh: 胡伯警官

translation.en: You on a playdate or something?
translation.zh: 你在玩手机游戏呢？

translation.en: Where the fuck are my evidence inventories?
translation.zh: 我的证据清单到底他妈的在哪里？

translation.en: There he is.
translation.zh: 他在这儿呢

translation.en: Keeping you in the cage. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 把自己关在笼子里了

translation.en: You finally getting those inventories straightened out?
translation.zh: 你终于开始整理证据清单了？

translation.en: [sighs] I'm trying.
translation.zh: 我在努力呢

translation.en: Fucking Mitchell wants everything letter-perfect.
translation.zh: 他妈的米切尔想要个完美无缺的清单

translation.en: It's a pain in my ass.
translation.zh: 真让人头疼

translation.en: Yeah, I bet.
translation.zh: 是啊 可不么

translation.en: -Are you good otherwise? -Otherwise what?
translation.zh: -除此之外 你还好吗？-什么意思？

translation.en: I'm worried about you, man.
translation.zh: 我很担心你 兄弟

translation.en: Grown-ass fucking men don't worry
translation.zh: 我们都是成年人了

translation.en: about other grown-ass fucking men, Barnesey.
translation.zh: 你就不必担心我了 巴恩斯

translation.en: I'm fine. I'm just… tired of Mitchell's bullshit.
translation.zh: 我没事 只不过…受够了米切尔的这一套

translation.en: I feel you. He wouldn't do it if he didn't love you.
translation.zh: 是啊 我懂你不过他这样做也是因为他爱你

translation.en: [chuckling] Right.
translation.zh: 行吧

translation.en: Look, you don't have to tell me, but if you ever need to talk,
translation.zh: 听着 你不必跟我说什么但如果你想聊聊的话

translation.en: chat, shoot the shit, whatever--
translation.zh: 闲聊 找人说说话什么的

translation.en: I'm good, man. You don't have to worry about me.
translation.zh: 我没事的 兄弟 你不必担心我

translation.en: -Okay. -I'm good.
translation.zh: -好吧-我没事

translation.en: [newswoman] Law enforcement officials are no closer to solving the brutal murder
translation.zh: 内华达州司法部长威廉芬顿被残忍杀害一案

translation.en: of Nevada Attorney General William Fenton, who was found slain.
translation.zh: 警方目前依然未能获取任何进展

translation.en: We will continue to work both at the local and state level
translation.zh: 我们会继续与当地警方及州级警方共同合作

translation.en: to bring the person or persons responsible for these senseless murders to justice.
translation.zh: 将犯下此愚蠢罪行的当事人绳之于法

translation.en: Yeah. First 48, turned to 72, turned to 96.
translation.zh: 是啊 一开始说48小时拖到72小时 又拖到了96小时

translation.en: It's embarrassing. I mean, it's only the Attorney General of Nevada.
translation.zh: 真是丢脸这可是内华达州的司法部长

translation.en: This fucking guy Murretto has been busted more times than I've made busts.
translation.zh: 这个叫莫洛托的混蛋被逮捕的次数比我逮捕别人的次数还多

translation.en: Twenty-two arrests and no charges. How does that happen?
translation.zh: 被逮捕22次 但没有一项指控这是怎么回事？

translation.en: -[revolver clicks] -There it is. What are you doing?
translation.zh: -原来在这里-你在做什么？

translation.en: I'm working on my Rodent Roulette.
translation.zh: 我在练习我的“灭鼠轮盘”技能

translation.en: Rodent Roulette?
translation.zh: “灭鼠轮盘”

translation.en: Yeah. In Indiana, we used to pistol hunt everything, squirrels, rabbits.
translation.zh: 是啊 在印第安纳州我们会用手枪射击一切 松鼠、兔子

translation.en: So my dad came up with this thing.
translation.zh: 所以我爸想出了这个游戏

translation.en: You take one round, drop it in the wheel,
translation.zh: 拿一颗子弹 放进转轮里

translation.en: spin it.
translation.zh: 旋转转轮

translation.en: It's gotta land on that cylinder.
translation.zh: 必须正好落在那个弹膛上

translation.en: Squirrel soup.
translation.zh: 松鼠炖菜就有了

translation.en: And were you any good? Did you get any squirrels?
translation.zh: 你很擅长吗？打到过松鼠吗？

translation.en: -[male cop] I never did. My dad did. -Hm.
translation.zh: 我从没打到过 我爸打到过

translation.en: So you were a failure in the eyes of your father?
translation.zh: 所以你在你爸眼中是个失败的家伙？

translation.en: -That tracks. That's cool. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 看来你默认了 没什么的

translation.en: You're all cocky now 'cause you got that fancy Blackhawk.
translation.zh: 你现在这么牛逼是因为你有了那把花哨的黑鹰枪

translation.en: You didn't think I noticed that?
translation.zh: 你以为我没注意到吗？

translation.en: Oh, I'm surprised you noticed it, sitting all comfy-cozy on my hip.
translation.zh: 你居然注意到了这把枪正舒适地挂在我的胯上

translation.en: I'll quick-draw you for it.
translation.zh: 我来跟你比拔枪对射

translation.en: My Redhawk versus your Blackhawk.
translation.zh: 我的红鹰对战你的黑鹰

translation.en: I got 30 seconds.
translation.zh: 我有30秒的空闲时间

translation.en: Don't let the sarge see us dicking around.
translation.zh: 别让警长看见我们胡闹

translation.en: -You ready to do this? -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: -你准备好了吗？-绝对的

translation.en: Today?
translation.zh: 就今天？

translation.en: All right, you ready, gunslinger?
translation.zh: 好吧 准备好了吗 枪手？

translation.en: It's your move, cowgirl.
translation.zh: 轮到你了 牛仔女郎

translation.en: You know what? Speed kills.
translation.zh: 你猜怎么着？速度才是王道

translation.en: -Oh, I can put my grubby fingers on them? -Every time.
translation.zh: -我的脏手可以碰它？-每次都上当

translation.en: Bit quicker, man.
translation.zh: 下次快一点 伙计

translation.en: Pops said he'd be disappointed in me.
translation.zh: 她居然说老爹会对我失望

translation.en: I know who you are, pal.
translation.zh: 我知道你是谁 老兄

translation.en: I've heard all about you.
translation.zh: 你的事迹我都听说过

translation.en: Legendary Bob Viddick.
translation.zh: 传奇人物 鲍勃维迪克

translation.en: Some chilling shit floating around about you.
translation.zh: 传说你干过不少耸人听闻的事情

translation.en: That poor bastard in Tampa.
translation.zh: 坦帕城的那个可怜蛋

translation.en: You cut off his arm with a carving knife,
translation.zh: 你用切肉刀切断了他的胳膊

translation.en: and then you beat him to death with that same arm, right?
translation.zh: 然后用那只胳膊把他打死了 对吧？

translation.en: It was his leg.
translation.zh: 是他的腿

translation.en: I've heard about you too, Teddy.
translation.zh: 我也听说过你的事迹 泰迪

translation.en: They say you're very effective.
translation.zh: 他们说你很有效率

translation.en: How are you not dead a dozen different ways by now
translation.zh: 你居然挺到现在 没以各种方式死掉

translation.en: is a cross between a fluke and a fucking miracle.
translation.zh: 简直是侥幸和他妈奇迹的结合

translation.en: More magic trick than anything really.
translation.zh: 其实更不如说是变戏法

translation.en: Mind over matter.
translation.zh: 心胜于物

translation.en: I give people what they want.
translation.zh: 我会满足人们的需要

translation.en: You take more than you need.
translation.zh: 你太过贪婪

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Hey, what do you say we cut through all the bullshit?
translation.zh: 嘿 不如我们直截了当地说吧？

translation.en: You wanna live?
translation.zh: 你想活下去吗？

translation.en: That'd be nice.
translation.zh: 我挺愿意

translation.en: Right, and you still think that's possible because you haven't been paying attention.
translation.zh: 好吧 你觉得你还有可能活下去因为你根本没好好听

translation.en: -So you try to buy your way out. -Let's make a deal, man. I got money.
translation.zh: 所以你想买通自己的出路 我们做个交易吧 我有钱

translation.en: The money you stole from them?
translation.zh: 你从他们那里偷的钱？

translation.en: What you fail to understand, Teddy, is it's not about the money anymore.
translation.zh: 泰迪 你没明白这件事已经不光是钱那么简单了

translation.en: There's no play here, Teddy, no deal to be made.
translation.zh: 泰迪 我们没什么交易可谈

translation.en: It's a simple choice.
translation.zh: 这只是个简单的选择

translation.en: It's never simple.
translation.zh: 没有什么选择是简单的

translation.en: Are you a fucking idiot?
translation.zh: 你他妈的是不是傻？

translation.en: It is that simple.
translation.zh: 事情就是这么简单

translation.en: I'm running out of time, Teddy.
translation.zh: 我快没时间了 泰迪

translation.en: So they're running out of time.
translation.zh: 所以他们也快没时间了

translation.en: [Mitchell] Huber!
translation.zh: 胡伯！

translation.en: This is fucking bullshit.
translation.zh: 这他妈的太扯了

translation.en: [shouting] Will somebody get fucking Huber up here, please?
translation.zh: 能不能他妈的有人叫胡伯上来？

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. Are you Huber?
translation.zh: 真抱歉啊 你是胡伯吗？

translation.en: You have an open-door policy.
translation.zh: 你说过这里可以随便进的

translation.en: I also have a no-pain-in-the-ass policy, but you don't pay any attention to that.
translation.zh: 我也说过别来烦我 可你似乎没注意听这句话

translation.en: Twenty-two arrests, zero convictions.
translation.zh: 被逮捕22次 没有一项指控 谁？

translation.en: -Who? -Our mystery man, Teddy Murretto.
translation.zh: 我们那位神秘人 泰迪莫洛托

translation.en: Have we impounded that abandoned Crown Vic yet?
translation.zh: 那辆被遗弃的福特皇冠被扣留了吗？

translation.en: Yeah. I just sent Ruby and Barnes out to meet the tow truck driver.
translation.zh: 是的我刚派鲁比和巴恩斯去找拖车司机了

translation.en: -Did you read the state trooper's report? -Why in the hell would I read that report
translation.zh: 你看过州警的报告了吗？ 我怎么有空读州警的报告？

translation.en: when I'm buried in evidence inventories that don't make any goddamn sense?
translation.zh: 我正忙着看这些狗屁不通的证据清单

translation.en: [shouts] Will somebody please get Huber up here now?
translation.zh: 能不能有人叫胡伯立刻上来？

translation.en: You know you have a phone.
translation.zh: 你知道你有电话吧

translation.en: [clears throat] There was a cherry light and a siren mount on the dash.
translation.zh: 车的仪表盘上有警灯和警笛

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 所以呢？

translation.en: So here's my theory.
translation.zh: 所以我推测出一个理论

translation.en: Teddy either stole that unmarked off a cop,
translation.zh: 要么是泰迪从警察那里偷走了这辆便衣警车

translation.en: or he's impersonating a cop.
translation.zh: 要么他在冒充警察

translation.en: He's a fucking total bullshitter.
translation.zh: 他是个彻头彻尾的骗子

translation.en: Wait him out 'cause we can hold him indefinitely.
translation.zh: 等他自己招供我们可以无限期地扣留他

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Huber! If you are within the sound of my goddamn voice,
translation.zh: 胡伯！如果你能他妈的听见我

translation.en: get your big ass up here!
translation.zh: 那就赶快给我滚上来！

translation.en: Don't make me come looking for you!
translation.zh: 别逼我来找你！

translation.en: This motherfucker gonna make me come looking for him.
translation.zh: 这个混蛋居然逼我去找他

translation.en: Hue!
translation.zh: 胡伯！

translation.en: Huber, you in here?
translation.zh: 胡伯 你在这里吗？

translation.en: Shit!
translation.zh: 妈的！

translation.en: This is some bullshit.
translation.zh: 真是扯淡

translation.en: Anybody got eyes on Huber?
translation.zh: 有人看到胡伯了吗？

translation.en: Kim, you see him, tell him to get his ass in my office right now.
translation.zh: 金姆 你要是见到他让他立刻来我的办公室

translation.en: [Huber whispering] Listen to me, this is harassment, okay?
translation.zh: 听我说 你这是骚扰 好吗？

translation.en: I'm doing everything that I can.
translation.zh: 我已经在尽力而为了

translation.en: I've probably gotten about a key and a half out of evidence.
translation.zh: 我大概从证据箱里拿走了1.5千克

translation.en: Do you have any fucking idea what that entails?
translation.zh: 你他妈知道这意味着什么吗？

translation.en: What could happen to me if I--
translation.zh: 我会有什么结果 如果…

translation.en: I know I owe you.
translation.zh: 我知道我欠你的

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: What do I need to do?
translation.zh: 我该怎么做？

translation.en: Fuckin'…
translation.zh: 他妈的

translation.en: Fuck Fireball, dude.
translation.zh: 他妈的撒旦威士忌

translation.en: This fucking hangover is gonna be a motherfucking bitch if I don't get some aspirin in me too.
translation.zh: 如果不吃点阿司匹林这个该死的宿醉会他妈要了我的命

translation.en: Aspirin's bad for your liver.
translation.zh: 阿司匹林对你的肝脏不好

translation.en: Cool, dude. Thanks. You a fucking doctor?
translation.zh: 行吧 伙计 谢谢你是他妈的医生吗？

translation.en: [Bob] Yup.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Got my degree from the University of Common Sense.
translation.zh: 我拿到了常识大学的学位

translation.en: [man] Huh?
translation.zh: 啥？

translation.en: Yeah, I didn't think you studied there.
translation.zh: 是啊 你应该没在那里读过书

translation.en: [man] Huh?
translation.zh: 啥？

translation.en: I'm getting a sinking suspicion that, "Huh!"
translation.zh: 我现在开始怀疑 这个“啥”

translation.en: is the word that best describes you.
translation.zh: 是最能形容你的词了

translation.en: I'm getting the fucking suspicion--
translation.zh: 我现在他妈的开始怀疑…

translation.en: Fucking fuck you, dude.
translation.zh: 去你妈的 老兄

translation.en: What do you got there?
translation.zh: 这是什么东西？

translation.en: Just a minute.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: What the fuck?
translation.zh: 搞什么鬼？

translation.en: What the fuck?!
translation.zh: 怎么他妈回事？

translation.en: You fucking set an alarm to remind you to get your ass kicked?
translation.zh: 你他妈设了个闹钟提醒自己什么时候会被揍吗？

translation.en: I wouldn't poke the bear, pal.
translation.zh: 你最好别摸老虎屁股 伙计

translation.en: -Huh? -Oh, there it is again.
translation.zh: -啥？-又来了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: [scoffs] Oh, that's good, change it up. "Huh? What?" Keep 'em guessing.
translation.zh: 真不错 会换词了“啥？什么？” 让人猜不透呢

translation.en: [laughs] Dude, don't make me fuck you up in here, all right, man?
translation.zh: 老兄 别逼我在这里揍你一顿 好吗？

translation.en: You look like a fucking stepdad. I will slap the shit out of you.
translation.zh: 你看起来像是个继父 我会把你臭揍一顿

translation.en: You're looking at a real one, son.
translation.zh: 我可是货真价实的混混 孩子

translation.en: I don't give a shit.
translation.zh: 我才不在乎

translation.en: You feel me?
translation.zh: 你懂吗？

translation.en: I felt that.
translation.zh: 我懂这个

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 喂！

translation.en: Help! Hey, somebody help!
translation.zh: 救命！ 嘿 快来人帮忙啊！

translation.en: Hey! Help!
translation.zh: 喂！救命啊！

translation.en: -Hey! -Help!
translation.zh: -喂！-救命！

translation.en: -Hey, help! -Hey, somebody!
translation.zh: -嘿 帮帮他！-嘿 来人啊！

translation.en: He's having a seizure!
translation.zh: 他癫痫发作了！

translation.en: False alarm. Something caught fire in one of these evidence bins.
translation.zh: 火警误报证据箱子里有一个物品起火了

translation.en: Can someone please bring me a fucking fire extinguisher up here?
translation.zh: 有人能给我拿个他妈的灭火器吗？

translation.en: [female cop] We're on it.
translation.zh: 这就去

translation.en: Jesus Christ, that's loud.
translation.zh: 天啊 声音也太大了

translation.en: What the fuck is happening?
translation.zh: 到底他妈的怎么回事？

translation.en: Where you been, Huber? Sarge is lookin' for you.
translation.zh: 你去哪了 胡伯？警长在找你呢

translation.en: Yeah, his voice carries.
translation.zh: 没错 他吼得很大声

translation.en: Hey, who's this?
translation.zh: 喂 这是谁？

translation.en: That's the douchebag that clocked Young at the casino.
translation.zh: 就是那个在赌场打了杨一拳的混蛋

translation.en: Is he still down in holding?
translation.zh: 他还在拘留所吗？

translation.en: -Help! -Oh my God.
translation.zh: -救命！-我的天啊

translation.en: Somebody please help this man!
translation.zh: 谁来救救这家伙！

translation.en: He's gonna die! [laughs evilly]
translation.zh: 他要死了！

translation.en: Situation in holding. Get your ass down to holding now!
translation.zh: 拘留所发生险情 立刻前往拘留所！

translation.en: -[Teddy] Help! -[Bob] He's gonna die!
translation.zh: -救命！-他要死了！

translation.en: [Bob] He's gonna die!
translation.zh: 他要死了！

translation.en: He's foaming at the mouth.
translation.zh: 他的嘴在吐白沫

translation.en: -It's not a seizure! He did it! -[Bob] It's like he's got rabies.
translation.zh: -不是癫痫发作！是他干的！-他好像得了狂犬病

translation.en: -Oh my gosh! -Don't go in there!
translation.zh: -我的天啊-别进去！

translation.en: [Bob] He won't make it.
translation.zh: 他快没命了

translation.en: -What the fuck are you doing? -Watch your back!
translation.zh: 他快没命了 -搞什么鬼？-小心背后！

translation.en: -…prisoner doesn't appear to be breathing… -Hey, watch your back!
translation.zh: -囚犯似乎没有呼吸…-小心你的背后！

translation.en: Look out!
translation.zh: 小心！

translation.en: Oh, shit! Oh, shit!
translation.zh: 妈的！

translation.en: We got shots fired. We got shots fired.
translation.zh: 有人开枪了

translation.en: [Teddy] Help!
translation.zh: 救命！

translation.en: Help, he's trying to fucking kill me!
translation.zh: 救命 他想要他妈杀了我！

translation.en: Somebody!
translation.zh: 来人啊！

translation.en: You seem to have sobered up.
translation.zh: 你好像酒醒了

translation.en: I'm gonna need you to drop that gun
translation.zh: 我要你放下这把枪

translation.en: and lower yourself as flat as a board to the floor for me.
translation.zh: 然后给我平躺在地板上

translation.en: You're shaking.
translation.zh: 你在发抖

translation.en: [inhales] Yeah, I'm nervous.
translation.zh: 是啊 我很紧张

translation.en: It's amazing I haven't blown your fucking head off.
translation.zh: 我居然还没把你的脑袋炸掉真是太神奇了

translation.en: You assaulted my sergeant
translation.zh: 你袭击了我的警长

translation.en: and are attempting an escape.
translation.zh: 而且试图逃跑

translation.en: There's not a jury in Nevada that would… blah, blah, blah.
translation.zh: 内华达州没有哪个陪审团会放过你

translation.en: Drop that
translation.zh: 放下那把

translation.en: fucking gun.
translation.zh: 他妈的枪

translation.en: Now.
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: What the hell happened?
translation.zh: 到底怎么回事？

translation.en: We need an ambo in here now.
translation.zh: 我们现在需要一辆救护车

translation.en: Check Sarge.
translation.zh: 去查看一下警长

translation.en: [cop] Was he shot?
translation.zh: 他中枪了吗？

translation.en: No, but he was attacked.
translation.zh: 没有 但他被袭击了

translation.en: And get the other guy up to the infirmary. He's having trouble breathing.
translation.zh: 把另一个人送去医务室 他呼吸困难

translation.en: -[man] …laceration to the head. -Give me your right wrist.
translation.zh: 男性 头部有撕裂伤 把右手腕给我

translation.en: -Anything I can do to help, Officer? -Yeah, shut the fuck up.
translation.zh: 有什么我能帮忙的吗 警官？ 有 闭上嘴

translation.en: -[Teddy] I'm here if you need. -[female cop] Move!
translation.zh: -需要帮忙就跟我说-快走！

translation.en: -[cop] Let's get him on three. -The fuck you looking at him for?
translation.zh: -数到三就抬起他-你他妈看他干什么？

translation.en: -[cop] Val, you good? -[Val] Yeah.
translation.zh: -小瓦 你还好吗？-没事

translation.en: Cuff it right there, to your left.
translation.zh: 拷到你左边的栏杆上

translation.en: Show me.
translation.zh: 给我看看

translation.en: You wanna check 'em?
translation.zh: 你想检查一下吗？

translation.en: Sit down.
translation.zh: 坐下

translation.en: -Sarge, sit up. -[Mitchell grunts]
translation.zh: 警长 坐起来

translation.en: All right, look at me.
translation.zh: 好了 看着我

translation.en: All right, I think you dislocated your jaw.
translation.zh: 好吧 你的下巴应该是错位了

translation.en: Gonna have to reset it. I'm gonna stick my thumbs in your mouth.
translation.zh: 我得给它掰回去我要把拇指伸进你的嘴里

translation.en: One, two, three.
translation.zh: 一、二、三

translation.en: Okay, let's get up. Let's get up.
translation.zh: 好了 我们起来吧

translation.en: All right, get to the infirmary.
translation.zh: 好 快去医务室

translation.en: -Get the goddamn door! -I'm doing it!
translation.zh: -快开门！-我在开呢！

translation.en: Here we go. All right.
translation.zh: 好了 就是这里

translation.en: -Okay, that's good. -Guy's bleeding like a geyser.
translation.zh: 好的 很好

translation.en: All right, Sarge, I got you. Sit here.
translation.zh: 好 警长 扶着我 坐这里

translation.en: -Kimball, where's the ambulance? -Huber, help Sarge.
translation.zh: -金姆伯 救护车呢？-胡伯 帮帮警长

translation.en: This guy's bleeding like a geyser.
translation.zh: 这家伙的血像喷泉一样

translation.en: -All right, Sarge. -[Val] I think his windpipe is crushed.
translation.zh: -好了 警长-我觉得他的气管被堵住了

translation.en: Wait. What are you doing?
translation.zh: 等等 你在干什么？

translation.en: [Val] I'm gonna open his airway so he can breathe.
translation.zh: 我要打开他的气管 以便他呼吸

translation.en: Let's wait on the ambulance.
translation.zh: 还是等救护车吧

translation.en: -[Val] Wait on the ambulance? -Hey, buddy. It's good.
translation.zh: -等救护车？-嘿 伙计 没事的

translation.en: Calm down. Just calm down. It's okay.
translation.zh: 冷静点

translation.en: Hey, let's just wait for the doctor.
translation.zh: 嘿 我们还是等医生来吧

translation.en: All right. I did this in Army Medical Corp on a cadaver.
translation.zh: 我在陆军医疗队时 用尸体做过练习

translation.en: On a fucking cadaver?
translation.zh: -尸体？练习前也是尸体吗？-你开玩笑吗？

translation.en: -Was it a cadaver before you started? -Are you kidding?
translation.zh: -尸体？练习前也是尸体吗？-你开玩笑吗？ 我太紧张了 我一紧张就会讲冷笑话

translation.en: -I make bad jokes when I'm nervous. -We were trained. So let me focus.
translation.zh: 我太紧张了 我一紧张就会讲冷笑话 我们受过训练 所以别让我分心

translation.en: Wait, aren't you left-handed?
translation.zh: 等等 你不是左撇子吗？

translation.en: -Fucking, you're left-handed, fuck! -Shut the fuck up!
translation.zh: 妈的 你是左撇子啊 妈的！

translation.en: Let's just wait on the ambulance.
translation.zh: 我们还是等救护车吧

translation.en: Oh gosh.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Is he steady yet?
translation.zh: 他稳定了吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: He's breathing. Is he breathing?
translation.zh: 他在呼吸了 他在呼吸吧？

translation.en: Hey, we… we did it. That's how you--
translation.zh: 嘿 我们做到了 你就是这样…

translation.en: -All right. Keep an eye on him. -[male cop] That was badass.
translation.zh: -好了 留心看着他-太厉害了

translation.en: That was fucking badass, seriously.
translation.zh: 刚才你真的很厉害

translation.en: Hey, this is Huber.
translation.zh: 嘿 我是胡伯

translation.en: I was told to call you.
translation.zh: 有人叫我给你打电话

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Kim?
translation.zh: 金姆？

translation.en: Fuck!
translation.zh: （潜在指纹无法获取 待定） 妈的

translation.en: -[Kim growls] -Jesus fuck, Kimball!
translation.zh: 天啊 金姆伯！

translation.en: Don't do that!
translation.zh: 别这样！

translation.en: Motherfucker, what are you in my biz for?
translation.zh: 混蛋 你在我这里干什么呢？

translation.en: Hey, how long does it take for IAFIS to turn around prints usually?
translation.zh: 指纹系统通常要多久才会录入指纹？

translation.en: -They don't prioritize DUIs. -What does that mean?
translation.zh: 酒驾人士不是首要任务 什么意思？

translation.en: Gonna take a while.
translation.zh: 要花点时间

translation.en: What's got you so curious?
translation.zh: 你怎么这么好奇？

translation.en: -Curiosity. -[door buzzes]
translation.zh: 就是好奇

translation.en: Let's you and me talk, man-to-man.
translation.zh: 我们来面对面谈谈吧

translation.en: Never more than a day ahead of the devil.
translation.zh: 很快就会被恶魔追上

translation.en: Tell me, Teddy.
translation.zh: 告诉我 泰迪

translation.en: [Teddy] Tell you what?
translation.zh: 告诉你什么？

translation.en: Tell me why Mr. Meryl Streep back there faked a DUI to get into this station
translation.zh: 告诉我梅丽尔斯特里普先生为什么假装酒驾 就为了进警局来杀你？

translation.en: for a shot at killing you?
translation.zh: 就为了进警局来杀你？

translation.en: I don't know. Why don't you ask him?
translation.zh: 我不知道 你怎么不去问他？

translation.en: Bob Viddick.
translation.zh: 鲍勃维迪克

translation.en: Why are you trying to kill him?
translation.zh: 你为什么要杀他？

translation.en: What do you care? You don't even like him.
translation.zh: 你何必在意？你又不喜欢他

translation.en: Why is he trying to kill you, Teddy?
translation.zh: 他为什么要杀你 泰迪？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Let's do this.
translation.zh: 这样吧

translation.en: You can tell me everything, and I mean every last fucking thing,
translation.zh: 你要不然把一切都告诉我他妈的所有细节都说出来

translation.en: or option two, you can keep smart-assing me,
translation.zh: 要不然第二个选择你也可以跟我耍小聪明

translation.en: shrugging off my questions
translation.zh: 不理会我的问题

translation.en: with that stupid fucking look on your face,
translation.zh: 一直摆出这副傻逼表情

translation.en: and I'll put you and your pal in the same cell together.
translation.zh: 我就把你和你的朋友关在一起

translation.en: You're not gonna do that.
translation.zh: 你不会那么做的

translation.en: Let's not be ridiculous.
translation.zh: 别闹了

translation.en: Seriously.
translation.zh: 说真的

translation.en: You can't do it. You're not allowed to do it, remember?
translation.zh: 你不能这样做法律不允许的 还记得吗？

translation.en: Stop fucking around.
translation.zh: 别他妈胡闹了

translation.en: I'm as far away from fucking around as you can possibly get.
translation.zh: 我可他妈的一点儿都没胡闹

translation.en: You still drunk?
translation.zh: 你还醉吗？

translation.en: -Sober as a judge. -[Val] Hm.
translation.zh: 清醒得不得了

translation.en: -You gonna fuck with me? -Nope.
translation.zh: 你会耍我吗？ 不会

translation.en: -Not you. -Problem solved.
translation.zh: -要耍的人不是你-问题解决了

translation.en: Look, this is way beyond anything you wanna get involved with, lady. You don't understand.
translation.zh: 你绝对不想参与到这件事里 你不懂

translation.en: No, you don't understand how incredibly fucking bored I am.
translation.zh: 不 是你不懂我有多他妈的无聊

translation.en: Okay, fuck it.
translation.zh: 好吧 去他妈的

translation.en: You wanna know?
translation.zh: 你想知道吗？

translation.en: I'll tell you.
translation.zh: 那我告诉你

translation.en: All right, what I do, my profession, I put people together.
translation.zh: 好吧 我的工作 我的职业就是把人联系到一起

translation.en: High-profile people, like-minded, shared interests,
translation.zh: 志趣相投、有共同利益的高层次人士

translation.en: movers-and-shakers kind of shit.
translation.zh: 有权有势的那类人

translation.en: Cops, politicians, entrepreneurs, heads of state. I handle them all.
translation.zh: 警察、政客、企业家、国家元首我都会接触到

translation.en: Call it high-end consultancy.
translation.zh: 算是高级咨询师吧

translation.en: You're a fixer.
translation.zh: 你是个中间人

translation.en: [Teddy] No, I hate that fucking term. I don't fix.
translation.zh: 不 我讨厌这个词 我不是干这个的

translation.en: I manufacture… opportunities.
translation.zh: 我负责制造机会

translation.en: [Bob] She doesn't have to get hurt, Teddy.
translation.zh: 没必要把她拖下水 泰迪

translation.en: What he knows,
translation.zh: 他所知道的内幕

translation.en: you don't need to know.
translation.zh: 你不必了解

translation.en: I'm all ears.
translation.zh: 我洗耳恭听

translation.en: You read the papers?
translation.zh: 你读报纸吗？

translation.en: [Val] That's mostly what I do here.
translation.zh: 我在这里大部分时间都在读报纸

translation.en: So you know about the Nevada Attorney General that was murdered last week, Fenton?
translation.zh: 所以你知道上周被杀的那个司法部长芬顿？

translation.en: [woman] Bill? Motion's done.
translation.zh: 威廉？议案完成了

translation.en: [Teddy] The people I work for, they got their hooks into everything.
translation.zh: 我为之工作的那些人 他们掌控一切

translation.en: [woman] Just need you to sign it so I can file.
translation.zh: 只需要你签字 我就可以归档了

translation.en: [Teddy] When I say everything in the state of Nevada,
translation.zh: 我所说的内华达州的一切

translation.en: I'm talking about the gaming industry.
translation.zh: 是指赌博业

translation.en: [Teddy] That is the summit from which everything else flows forth.
translation.zh: 那正是一切事情的源头

translation.en: Now, my job is simple. I keep them talking. I keep them happy.
translation.zh: 我的工作很简单我让他们供出信息 我满足他们

translation.en: This guy, Fenton, uh…
translation.zh: 这个芬顿

translation.en: He was a crusader.
translation.zh: 他可是个改革者

translation.en: So you tried to buy him off.
translation.zh: 所以你想收买他

translation.en: [Teddy] Multiple times.
translation.zh: 试过很多次

translation.en: And he wasn't biting.
translation.zh: 可他没上钩

translation.en: [Teddy] Not even a nibble.
translation.zh: 一点也不为所动

translation.en: But when they clipped Fenton, walls came crumbling down.
translation.zh: 但他们杀了芬顿后一切都崩溃瓦解了

translation.en: He recorded everything I said with him,
translation.zh: 他录下了我和他的所有对话

translation.en: and he used that as leverage to get me to roll.
translation.zh: 然后利用这一点逼我告诉他犯罪活动

translation.en: Teddy, you're about to perjure yourself
translation.zh: 泰迪 你接下来要说的伪证

translation.en: to people that will butcher your entire fucking bloodline.
translation.zh: 会让那帮人杀死你的整个家族

translation.en: If you don't come clean, I can't help you.
translation.zh: 如果你不坦白 我也帮不了你

translation.en: The feds offered me a deal.
translation.zh: 联邦调查局跟我谈了条件

translation.en: I took the deal.
translation.zh: 我接受了

translation.en: What kind of deal?
translation.zh: 什么条件？

translation.en: Reciprocal.
translation.zh: 互惠交易

translation.en: -I'm invisible. That's where I'm… -Get people to turn.
translation.zh: -我是隐形的 那是…-让别人供出信息

translation.en: What do you mean, "What the fuck am I talking about?"
translation.zh: 你说“我他妈在说什么”是什么意思？

translation.en: High-level.
translation.zh: 高层人士

translation.en: -People with their hands in the mix. -Listen to me.
translation.zh: 参与其中的那些人 听我说 别再给我添乱了

translation.en: Don't bust my balls on this.
translation.zh: 听我说 别再给我添乱了

translation.en: And then one night, I almost got accidented.
translation.zh: 然后有一天晚上我差点就发生“意外”了

translation.en: What does that mean?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: They almost blew me the fuck up.
translation.zh: 他们差点把我炸死

translation.en: So I had to go to ground.
translation.zh: 所以我不得不低调下来

translation.en: Disappear.
translation.zh: 让自己消失

translation.en: [Bob] Why don't you tell her about the money, Teddy?
translation.zh: 你为什么不告诉她钱的事 泰迪？

translation.en: I haven't heard you mention the money once.
translation.zh: 钱的事情你还一次都没提过呢

translation.en: What money?
translation.zh: 什么钱？

translation.en: Go on, Teddy, now that we're all "sharing."
translation.zh: 说啊 泰迪既然我们都在“分享”故事了

translation.en: Tell her about the millions you siphoned off and stashed away somewhere.
translation.zh: 跟她讲讲你偷走然后藏在某处的几百万

translation.en: -The feds knew about the money. -Bullshit.
translation.zh: 联邦局知道钱的事 胡扯

translation.en: [Teddy] It's not bullshit.
translation.zh: 不是胡扯

translation.en: Lady, this guy will roll in your fucking guts
translation.zh: 女士 如果这家伙有机会的话

translation.en: given the opportunity.
translation.zh: 他会扯出你的肠子

translation.en: I'll take my chances.
translation.zh: 我愿意冒险

translation.en: Hard chargers get charged hard.
translation.zh: 急于求成反而会害了自己

translation.en: What does that mean?
translation.zh: 这话什么意思？

translation.en: Wait, you don't know--
translation.zh: 等等 你不知道…

translation.en: It means, if you push too much, then you get pushed back harder--
translation.zh: 意思就是 如果你用力过猛那么效果反而不好

translation.en: -Doesn't sound as cool. -But it's meant to be helpful?
translation.zh: 这么说不够酷 这话是为了帮我吗？

translation.en: -What the fuck do you think I said it for? -Okay. All right.
translation.zh: 不然我他妈为什么要说？ 好吧 好的

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Val] All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Take me through the last 24 hours.
translation.zh: 跟我说说过去24小时的事情

translation.en: The gunshot wound, the Crown Vic, et cetera.
translation.zh: 枪伤、福特皇冠之类的

translation.en: All of it.
translation.zh: 全部细节

translation.en: [Teddy] A pair of Vegas's finest drove me out of town to, quote,
translation.zh: 拉斯维加斯的两位警官开车带我出城 美名曰

translation.en: "deliver me to the FBI," unquote.
translation.zh: “送我去联邦调查局”

translation.en: It was bullshit.
translation.zh: 其实是胡扯

translation.en: These cops were bent.
translation.zh: 这些警察已被收买了

translation.en: I had a date with a hole in the desert.
translation.zh: 他们想在沙漠里杀了我

translation.en: Thank God the feds were shadowing me, or I'd have been totally fucked.
translation.zh: 还好联邦调查局在跟踪我否则我就彻底完蛋了

translation.en: [FBI agent] Hey! Drop your weapons!
translation.zh: 放下武器！

translation.en: [man] Goddamn it!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: [agent 1] Where is he?
translation.zh: 他在哪里？

translation.en: -[agent 2] Over there! -[Teddy] Motherfuck!
translation.zh: -在那边！-混蛋！

translation.en: [agent 3] Stop him!
translation.zh: 拦住他！

translation.en: Don't shoot!
translation.zh: 别开枪！

translation.en: [agent 1] He's in the fucking car! Get him!
translation.zh: 他在他妈的车里！ 抓住他！

translation.en: [Teddy] Fuck!
translation.zh: 妈的

translation.en: Fuck!
translation.zh: 妈的！

translation.en: Teddy Murretto does not die, motherfucker!
translation.zh: 泰迪莫洛托是不会死的 混蛋！

translation.en: [Val] This is Young down in holding. Kim, you around?
translation.zh: 我是杨 正在拘留所 金姆 你在吗？

translation.en: -Right here, sugar. -[Val] Are Barnes and Ruby still off-site?
translation.zh: 我就在这里 巴恩斯和鲁比还没回来吗？

translation.en: On their way back with the tow truck.
translation.zh: 他们在去找拖车的路上

translation.en: All right, have the tow truck continue on here,
translation.zh: 好吧 继续叫拖车回到这里

translation.en: but ask Barnes and Ruby if they can reroute to the old Nomad Motel
translation.zh: 不过问问巴恩斯和鲁比能否绕道去旧的诺麦德旅馆

translation.en: out on Route 95, just north of Lee Canyon.
translation.zh: 就在95号公路边 在里谷北侧

translation.en: Possible crime scene, multiple shooting victims.
translation.zh: 那里可能有犯罪现场多个枪击受害者

translation.en: [Kim] There hasn't been a call out.
translation.zh: 没有人报警啊

translation.en: I know. Just have them radio once they're on scene.
translation.zh: 我知道让他们到了现场就用无线电联系

translation.en: It's gonna be all right, Sarge.
translation.zh: 没事的 警长

translation.en: We're gonna take care of everything.
